thread.title: Rohan Reid Joins LIBERTY Dental Plan as Chief Operating Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Rohan Reid Joins LIBERTY Dental Plan as Chief Operating Officer
text:
IRVINE, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- LIBERTY Dental Plan, a national Dental Benefits Administrator, is proud to announce that as of January 8, 2018, Mr. Rohan C. Reid has joined the Company as Chief Operating Officer. Mr. Reid will oversee company operations nationally and will be located at Company headquarters in Irvine, CA. Mr. Reid brings a depth of health plan experience to LIBERTY at a time of significant national growth and expansion.
“I am so pleased to welcome Rohan on behalf of the LIBERTY Dental Plan family. We are looking forward to learning and benefitting from one of the industry’s most respected and experienced operations professionals,” said Dr. Amir Neshat, Founder and CEO.
Mr. Reid’s Background:
Rohan C. Reid served as the Chief Operating Officer of Lovelace Health Plan and Lovelace Insurance Company and served as Vice President of Contact Center Operation and Commercial Operations for Delta Dental of California which encompassed nearly 14 million enrollees. Mr. Reid also served as Vice President of Claims Operations for Health Net Health Plan. He has extensive claims processing experience and more than 20 years in the medical management and insurance fields working for organizations such as Yale University, the Los Angeles County Department of Health Services, Southern California Permanente Medical Group, Kaiser Permanente Health Plan and Kaiser Foundation Health Plan as statewide director of health plan claims. Mr. Reid earned his undergraduate degree in anthropology from State University of New York at Stony Brook and graduate degrees in epidemiology and public health, both from Yale University School of Medicine.
About LIBERTY Dental Plan:
LIBERTY has been proudly administering the full scope of dental benefit services, over the last sixteen years, to its members, contracted providers and clients including several Fortune 500 plan partners and companies, Labor and Trust organizations, government agencies and private individuals. Founded by dentist Amir Neshat, the company prides itself on providing the same level of quality benefits that private pay members receive to its government-sponsored, underserved members. To accomplish this mission, Dr. Neshat has assembled a leadership team with over 200 years of combined experience in the dental industry. LIBERTY operates and lives by the slogan “Helping Members Shine – One Smile at a Time.” Its philosophy is simple and has remained the same since its inception and that is to be committed to placing its members in the continuum of oral health care and ensuring that they receive quality, innovative and efficient dental benefits.
For more information on LIBERTY Dental Plan please visit www.libertydentalplan.com .
